title: Instagram puts its standalone Boomerang and Hyperlapse apps to rest
content:
After pulling the plug on the standalone IGTV app earlier this month, Instagram has now removed the Boomerang and Hyperlapse apps from the Google Play Store and the Apple App Store. Although Instagram hasn’t made a formal announcement about the removals, reports suggest that the company pulled all three apps from app stores simultaneously. According

The post Instagram puts its standalone Boomerang and Hyperlapse apps to rest appeared first on xda-developers.
description: After removing the standalone IGTV app from app stores earlier this month, Instagram has now removed its Boomerang and Hyperlapse apps.
